Miles Sound System SDK 6.6h

AIL_digital_master_volume_level

The function AIL_digital_master_volume_level returns the current digital master volume setting in use.

F32 AIL_digital_master_volume_level(
  HDIGDRIVER dig
);

In Parameters

dig
indicates the driver for which the master volume setting is to be determined.

Returns

The current digital master volume setting (0-1.0, with 0 corresponding to complete silence and 1.0 corresponding to zero attenuation).

Discussion

By default, the digital master volume value is initialized to 1.0 (no attenuation).


Group: 2D Digital Audio Services
Related Functions: AIL_sample_volume_pan, AIL_set_digital_master_volume_level, AIL_set_sample_volume_pan
Related Basic Types: F32, HDIGDRIVER
